alert.note: Alert for Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bibb and Twiggs Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Franklinton, or 7 miles southeast of Macon, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Macon, Jeffersonville, Danville, Allentown, Marion, Bullard, Fitzpatrick, Ripley, Huber, District Path, Dry Branch, Myricks Mill, Franklinton and Tarversville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
